700151f-a.title: Bronx: 153rd Street - 157th Street (East)
700151f-a.text:
East 153rd Street, north side, east from East 157th Street (left) to Cromwell Ave., showing the cleared triangular area bounded by the three aforementioned thoroughfares. On the extreme left is partly visible the Yankee Stadium and, in the background, the Bronx County Court House. The garage is at the S.E. corner of Cromwell Ave. and East
157th Street.
September 21, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

700159f-a.title: Bronx: 157th Street (East) - 153rd Street
700159f-a.text:
East 157th Street, at the junction of East 153rd Street. The view
is northwestward.
September 21, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
